# Static Map
```{r map_jpg, echo=FALSE, eval=TRUE}
dir.sub3 <- "SiteInfo"
fn_img <- file.path(dir_results, TargetSiteID, dir.sub3
                    , paste0(TargetSiteID, "_map.png"))
if (file.exists(fn_img) == TRUE) {
  knitr::include_graphics(fn_img)
} else {
  print("No static map exists.")
}

```


# Interactive Map

```{r map_leaflet, echo=FALSE, eval=TRUE}

'%>%' <- dplyr::'%>%'

# Leaflet

# Data

if (useBC) {
  
    lmap <- leaflet::leaflet(data = sp_outline) %>%
        leaflet::addProviderTiles(leaflet::providers$Stamen.Terrain) %>%
        # Groups, Overlay
        leaflet::addPolygons(data = sp_outline, color = "black", fill = "transparent") %>%
        leaflet::addPolylines(data = sp_flowline # All reaches
                              , color = "#2687D1"
                              # , group = "All streams"
                              , opacity = 0.8
                              , weight = 1.5) %>%
        leaflet::addCircleMarkers(data = sp_sites # All Sites
                                  , group = "All sites"
                                  , color = "gray50"
                                  , fillColor = "gray50"
                                  , radius = 4
                                  , stroke = TRUE
                                  , weight = 1
                                  , fillOpacity = 0.8
                                  , opacity = 0.6
                                  , popup = ~StationID) %>%
        leaflet::addCircleMarkers(data = sp_outside # Cluster Sites
                                  , group = "Outside the case sites"
                                  , color = "gray25"
                                  , fillColor = "gray25"
                                  , radius = 4
                                  , stroke = TRUE
                                  , weight = 1
                                  , fillOpacity = 0.8 
                                  , opacity = 0.6
                                  , popup = ~StationID) %>%
        leaflet::addCircleMarkers(data = sp_inside # Cluster Sites
                                  , group = "Inside the case sites"
                                  , color = "cyan3"
                                  , fillColor = "cyan3"
                                  , radius = 4
                                  , stroke = TRUE
                                  , weight = 1
                                  , fillOpacity = 0.8 
                                  , opacity = 0.6
                                  , popup = ~StationID) %>%
        leaflet::addCircleMarkers(data = sp_refsites # Reference Sites
                                  , group = "Reference sites"
                                  , color = "blue"
                                  , fillColor = "transparent"
                                  , radius = 4
                                  , stroke = TRUE
                                  , weight = 2
                                  # , fillOpacity = 0.8
                                  , opacity = 0.6
                                  , popup = ~StationID) %>%
        leaflet::addCircleMarkers(data = sp_targetsite # Target Site
                                  , group = "Target site"
                                  , color = "red"
                                  , fillColor = "red"
                                  , radius = 6
                                  , stroke = TRUE
                                  , weight = 1
                                  , fillOpacity = 0.8
                                  , opacity = 1) %>%

       # Add Layer Control
        leaflet::addLayersControl(
            baseGroups = "Terrain"
            , overlayGroups = c("All sites", "Outside the case sites"
                                , "Inside the case sites","Reference sites"
                                , "Target site")
            , options = leaflet::layersControlOptions(collapsed = TRUE
                                                      , autoZIndex = TRUE)) %>%
        leaflet::addMiniMap("bottomleft")
    
    lmap
  
} else {
  
    lmap <- leaflet::leaflet(data = sp_outline) %>%
        leaflet::addProviderTiles(leaflet::providers$Stamen.Terrain) %>%
        # Groups, Overlay
        leaflet::addPolygons(data = sp_outline, color = "black", fill = "transparent") %>%
        leaflet::addPolylines(data = sp_flowline # All reaches
                              , color = "#2687D1"
                              # , group = "All streams"
                              , opacity = 0.8
                              , weight = 1.5) %>%
        leaflet::addCircleMarkers(data = sp_outside # Cluster Sites
                                  , group = "Outside the case sites"
                                  , color = "gray25"
                                  , fillColor = "gray25"
                                  , radius = 4
                                  , stroke = TRUE
                                  , weight = 1
                                  , fillOpacity = 0.8 
                                  , opacity = 0.6
                                  , popup = ~StationID) %>%
        leaflet::addCircleMarkers(data = sp_inside # Cluster Sites
                                  , group = "Inside the case sites"
                                  , color = "cyan3"
                                  , fillColor = "cyan3"
                                  , radius = 4
                                  , stroke = TRUE
                                  , weight = 1
                                  , fillOpacity = 0.8 
                                  , opacity = 0.6
                                  , popup = ~StationID) %>%
        leaflet::addCircleMarkers(data = sp_refsites # Reference Sites
                                  , group = "Reference sites"
                                  , color = "blue"
                                  , fillColor = "transparent"
                                  , radius = 4
                                  , stroke = TRUE
                                  , weight = 2
                                  # , fillOpacity = 0.8
                                  , opacity = 0.6
                                  , popup = ~StationID) %>%
        leaflet::addCircleMarkers(data = sp_targetsite # Target Site
                                  , group = "Target site"
                                  , color = "red"
                                  , fillColor = "red"
                                  , radius = 6
                                  , stroke = TRUE
                                  , weight = 1
                                  , fillOpacity = 0.8
                                  , opacity = 1) %>%

       # Add Layer Control
        leaflet::addLayersControl(
            baseGroups = "Terrain"
            , overlayGroups = c("Outside the case sites","Inside the case sites"
                                ,"Reference sites", "Target site")
            , options = leaflet::layersControlOptions(collapsed = TRUE
                                                      , autoZIndex = TRUE)) %>%
        leaflet::addMiniMap("bottomleft")
    
    lmap
  
}
```
